data.event: Recommissioned for service in America and West Indies Squadron. (NH.n)
AJAX rejoined America and West Indies Squadron at Bermuda (NH.n)

event.title: AJAX Deployed with Squadron in West Indies

data.event: (NH.n)

event.title: AJAX deployed off west coast of South America

data.event: (NH.n)
AJAX and EXETER detached to Talcuahano, Chile to assist local authority in rescue of victims following an earthquake. (NH.n)
(NH.n)

event.title: AJAX deployed with South American Division in South Atlantic

data.event: (NH.n)
AJAX deployed for trade defence duty. (NH.n)
HMS AJAX intercepts the German merchant Olinda (4576 GRT) off the coast of Uruguay in position 33°50'S, 53°30'W. The German ship is sunk by gunfire. (U.n)

HMS AJAX intercepts the German merchant Carl Fritzen (6594 GRT) in the South Atlantic off the coast off Uruguay in position 34°19'S, 48°29'W. However before the ship can be captured she is scuttled by her crew. (U.n)
Guardship at Port Stanley and carried out patrol in Falklands area. (NH.n)
Redeployed on trade defence between Plate Estuary and Rio de Janeiro. (NH.n)
AJAX joined HM Cruiser EXETER after sinking of ss CLEMENT by German battleship GRAF SPEE which had left Germany before the outbreak of war. (NH.n)
AJAX deployed with HM Cruisers EXETER and CUMBERLAND as Force G Hunting Group in South Atlantic to search for GRAF SPEE. (NH.n)
(NH.n)

The German passenger ship Ussukuma (7834 GRT) is intercepted in the South Atlantic off Bahia Blanca, Argentina in position 39°25'S, 57°15'W by the British heavy cruiser HMS Cumberland and the British light cruiser HMS Ajax. However, before the German ship can be captured she is scuttled by her own crew. (U.n)

event.title: On watch off Rio de la Plata

data.event: HMS AJAX, HMS CUMBERLAND and HMS ACHILLES remained off Plate estuary. (NH.n)
AJAX detached to refuel at Port Stanley. (NH.n)
(NH.n)
(NH.n)
Passage to Freetown, via Rio de Janeiro. Joined by HM Aircraft Carrier ARK ROYAL, HM Battlecruiser RENOWN, HM Destroyers HASTY, HERO, DAINTY and DIAMOND during passage (NH.n)

event.title: AJAX makes passage to Plymouth for refit

data.event: (NH.n)
